other_tests.findings: Thyroid hormone levels were abnormal at the age of 3 years.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Thyroid hormone levels were monitored annually, with increasing levels despite treatment.

other_tests.findings: Pathology report showed a thyroid gland with hyperplastic features.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The patient remained euthyroid following the surgery and initiated l-T4 replacement therapy.

other_tests.findings: Pathology report showed sections of thyroid gland with large follicles.
Confirmed the heterozygous state for the G431S mutation in the patient and the father.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Sequencing of the grandmother revealed a very small A wave under the G wave, indicating possible mosaicism.
